title: QBML Query Definition
description:
Query Builder Markup Language - JSON-based query definitions for qb.

Documentation: https://qb.ortusbooks.com/

action.description: A QBML action object. Each action represents a single query builder method call.

conditionalAction.description:
**Conditional Action** - Execute an action only when a condition is met.

Useful for building dynamic queries based on runtime parameters.

**Example:**
```json
{
  "when": { "param": "search", "notEmpty": true },
  "whereLike": ["name", { "$param": "search" }]
}
```

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/when)

unconditionalWhereAction.description:
WHERE conditions filter query results (without conditional when clause).

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/wheres)

whereBasicOnly.description:
**WHERE - Basic Comparison**

Filters results using column comparisons.

**Simple comparison:**
```json
{ "where": ["status", "active"] }
```

**With operator:**
```json
{ "where": ["age", ">", 18] }
```

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/wheres#simple-where-clauses)

sourceAction.description: Source actions define which table(s) to query from.

fromAction.description:
**FROM - Specify the table to query**

Sets the primary table for your query.

**Simple:**
```json
{ "from": "users" }
```

**With alias:**
```json
{ "from": "users u" }
```

**With schema:**
```json
{ "from": "dbo.customers c" }
```

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/from)

oneOf.description:
**Table name** - Optionally include an alias after a space

Examples: `"users"`, `"users u"`, `"dbo.orders o"`
**Object form** with explicit table and alias properties

tableAction.description: Alias for 'from'. Specify the table to query from.

fromSubAction.description:
Use a subquery as the FROM source (derived table).

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/from#fromsub)

fromRawAction.description:
Use a raw SQL expression as the FROM source.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/from#fromraw)

selectAction.description:
**SELECT - Define columns to retrieve**

Specifies which columns to include in the query results.

**Options:**
- `select` - Primary column selection
- `addSelect` - Add columns to existing selection
- `distinct` - Remove duplicate rows
- `selectRaw` - Raw SQL expressions
- `subSelect` - Subquery as column
- Aggregates: `count`, `sum`, `avg`, `min`, `max`

selectColumns.description:
**SELECT - Choose columns to retrieve**

**All columns:**
```json
{ "select": "*" }
```

**Specific columns:**
```json
{ "select": ["id", "name", "email"] }
```

**With aliases:**
```json
{ "select": ["u.id", "u.name AS username"] }
```

**With raw SQL:**
```json
{ "select": ["id", { "$raw": "COUNT(*) AS total" }] }
```

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/selects)

oneOf.description: **Array of columns** - Can include aliases (`col AS alias`) and raw expressions

addSelectAction.description:
Add additional columns to an existing select.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/selects#addselect)

distinct.description: Set to true to add DISTINCT

selectRawAction.description:
Add a raw SQL expression to the SELECT clause.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/selects#selectraw)

subSelectAction.description:
Add a scalar subquery to the SELECT clause.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/selects#subselect)

selectAggregateAction.description:
Add an aggregate function to the SELECT clause.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/aggregates)

oneOf.description: Array format: [column, value] or [column, operator, value]

joinRawAction.description:
Join with a raw table expression.

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/joins#joinraw)

whenCondition.description:
**when - Conditional Action**

Execute an action only when a condition is met. Useful for building dynamic queries based on runtime parameters.

**Parameter check:**
```json
{ "when": { "param": "search", "notEmpty": true }, "whereLike": ["name", { "$param": "search" }] }
```

**Available conditions:**
- `notEmpty` - Parameter has a non-empty value
- `isEmpty` - Parameter is empty or null
- `hasValue` - Parameter exists and has a value
- `gt`, `gte`, `lt`, `lte`, `eq`, `neq` - Comparison operators

[qb docs](https://qb.ortusbooks.com/query-builder/building-queries/when)

notEmpty.description: True if param should be non-empty

isEmpty.description: True if param should be empty

gte.description: Greater than or equal comparison value

lte.description: Less than or equal comparison value

or.description: At least one condition must be true
